short_summary: Kingston Data Center DC1500M - SSD - 7.68 TB - U.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 (NVMe)
description: The Shared Services Canada is inviting Suppliers to participate in a competitive procurement process for the Kingston Data Center DC1500M - SSD - 7.68 TB - U.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 (NVMe) product. The product has to be delivered to the end user entities located in Quebec (except NCR) within the stipulated time
tags: Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration
full_summary:
### Kingston Data Center DC1500M - SSD - 7.68 TB - U.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 (NVMe) Tender Invitation

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00021331
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017793/21331
* **Publication Date**: January 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 20, 2023, at 02:00 p.m. (EST)
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

#### Tender Description

The Shared Services Canada is seeking a supplier for Kingston Data Center DC1500M - SSD - 7.68 TB - U.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 (NVMe) storage solution.

[Download the Tender Document](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/36EB263D-301C-4FF2-BD90-5020A3C5C949)
[Download the Amendment Document](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/0B3A92FD-7F8A-4284-A259-C94D5D547562)

#### Contact Information

For any questions or requests regarding this tender, please contact:

Christiane Joanisse
Department of Shared Services Canada
Phone: 343-549-9457
Fax: (613) 960-6007
Email: christiane.joanisse@ssc-spc.gc.ca
